QuestData.Title: Removing Obstacles
QuestData.Description: $C! Interested in earning some coin?$B$BThe jarl of Jandvik is missing and two headstrong whelps are vying to take over leadership. I should be the next jarl, not them!$B$BI want you to enter Jandvik and defeat Calder and Eynar in mortal combat.$B$BI would not normally put my trust in an outsider, but this situation requires the aid of someone like you. Jandvik would condemn me if I were caught with their blood on my hands.$B$BMeet me in the center of Jandvik when the deed is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Calder and Eynar in Jandvik.
QuestData.RewardText: With my adversaries gone, I can claim leadership of Jandvik unopposed.
